trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: Ahmaergo has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: Ahmaergo can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: As a bonus action, Ahmaergo can regain 20 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Ahmaergo makes three attacks with his greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12+5) slashing damage, plus 7(2d6) slashing damage if Ahmaergo has more than half his hit points remaining.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 100/400ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
